text: Euphorbia jamesonii is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montane forests and subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador jamesonii Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Pierre Edmond Boissier
title: Euphorbia jamesonii
